title: Close To Me
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Close To Me par Trinix
When the hard times, when the hard times
Come closin' in
I will be there, I will be there
In the midst of it
Fear not, fear not
You're never alone
Never on your own
Seat in on the throne
I made you a home
I gave my life for you
Come close to me
I gave my life for you
Come close to me
Come close to me
Come close to me
Make me new

I wanna follow you
And god see me through
The things that I go through
'Cause I need you
God I need you, oh
'Cause I need you
God I need you, oh
I've been callin', callin'
On and on and on and
On and on and on
I could
I gave my life for you
Come close to me
Come close to me
Come close to me
